name: Overtaking
description: A queer RPG game taking place in a post-apocalyptic wasteland covered in monsters in a 2D pixelated art style. Because of an accident by Jacob, he and his boyfriend Micah are ripped apart by a cataclysmic disaster. Can they return the world to its original state? Can they find each other after a devastating event that forced them apart? You can only find out by playing!
